skills.name: Lady of the Fallen
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 30s] Fallen Rosemary enters Valfreyja Form immediately and unleashes soul-drinking mist around her dealing 200% ATK of Lightning DMG. Enemies in mist are Bedazzled and take 50.0% ATK of bonus lightning DMG from Ormr Rune's lightning for 15s. Each Charged ATK boosts host's Total DMG by 15.0% for 15s (cannot stack).

skills.name: Scent of the Dead
skills.description: Wielder's Charged ATK and Ultimate deal 15.0% bonus Lightning DMG. Team deals 15.0% bonus Total DMG to enemies affected by Stain of Trickery (cannot stack).
